attributes.action: slow down for horse on road signs
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.dailypost.co.uk/news/north-wales-news/2012/04/04/woman-warns-drivers-to-take-extra-care-after-her-horse-was-killed-after-being-struck-by-a-car-55578-30688013/
please  click on read link for full details
my horse was hit by a trailer and had to be put to sleep at the side of the road the driver was seen driving too fast the rider could have been killed we need to educate people of the dangers of approaching horses at speed on the roads we need roads signs in areas where there are riding school and livery yards
